H0.text: Which Manchester born physicist won the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1906 and is regarded as the founder of modern atomic physics. Ernest Rutherford

H1.text: Which Manchester born physicist won the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1906 and is regarded as the founder of modern atomic physics. Niels Bohr

H2.text: Which Manchester born physicist won the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1906 and is regarded as the founder of modern atomic physics. Robert Millikan

H3.text: Which Manchester born physicist won the Nobel Prize for Physics in 1906 and is regarded as the founder of modern atomic physics. Jjthomson

A4.text: Ernest Rutherford was awarded the Nobel Prize in Chemistry in 1908.

A5.text: Ernest Rutherford gave the Nobel Lecture on The Chemical Nature of the Alpha Particles from Radioactive Substances on 11 December 1908.

A6.text: The study of these lines led to the Bohr atom model and to the birth of quantum mechanics.
